title: Bug 120315: Display Property 'none' Not Taking Effect in New PDF Emitter
description: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', it doesn't take effect in the new PDF emitter.
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, the item remains visible instead of being hidden as expected.
EB: The expected behavior is that when the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, the item should be hidden and not visible in the generated PDF.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the new PDF emitter.
2. Set the display property of an item to 'none'.
3. Generate a PDF containing the item.
4. Observe that the item is still visible in the generated PDF, contrary to the expected behavior.
